verbose_text: XREF_BIBR As a result, desensitization of PAR4 completely eliminated aggregation in response to plasmin, and platelets treated with a PAR4 antagonist, as well as platelets isolated from PAR4 homozygous null mice, failed to aggregate in response to plasmin.
evidence: PAR4 completely eliminated aggregation in response to plasmin, and platelets treated with a PAR4 antagonist, as well as platelets isolated from PAR4 homozygous null mice, failed to aggregate in response to plasmin
